name: Invisible Rush
description:
Invisible Rush is a 2d platformer game. The objective of the game is to remember the platform positions, then try to jump all platforms that are invisible! But, there is a time limit to this game, so if you don't get to the end in time, game over!

Important:

This game is a prototype! The game is not the final game!

-----------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

A - move left

D - move right

Space - jump

Left Mouse Button - skip

----------------------------------------------------------

Developers:

ArbitDevs

Riccardo
